On this page I will include some additional supporting data visualisations. The council have pu

Firstly some visualisation of the allocation of Year 7 places across the city

Data taken from here - <https://www.brighton-hove.gov.uk/allocation-factsheet-year-7-places-september-2024>

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(tmap)
library(here)
```

```{r}
admissions <- read_csv(here("data", "Yr7_admissions.csv"))

```

```{r}

fig <- plot_ly(admissions, x = ~pan, y = ~School, type = 'bar') %>%
  layout(
    xaxis = list(
      title = "PAN 2024",
      categoryorder = "array",
      categoryarray = ~pan
    )
  )

# Display the plot
fig

```
